This sub is intended for exceptionally hilarious social media posts made by black people, not just any social media post made by black people. No bullying or witch-hunting. Don't complain about slang or ask for the definition of a term you don't understand if it can readily be found on urban dictionary . Posts about politics or political figures are not allowed. The moderators of this subreddit will take any action (which includes banning and removing comments) that they feel improves the quality of the subreddit.
